name: Insight (Zayron)
description:
A game made for MiniLD 62. Insight's Page

Use your powers of light to destroy the queen eye monster!

Game Controls:

Jump = W or space bar
Right = D
Left = A
Magic/Weapon = Left Mouse shoots. Mouse Aims

Hints:
- When the boss is below 50% heath the fight gets harder.
- When the boss is below 25% heath it can get very hard if you are not careful.

If you have comments I would love to hear them! Contact me here.
